ing: 1 cup brewed green tea (such as Gold PeakÂ®), chilled
1 pear, cored and cut into chunks
4 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
des: "Cantaloupe, pear, and pineapple team up with green tea and mint for a light and lovely smoothie. Yogurt adds protein to make it a delicious meal replacement."
ins: Combine tea, pineapple, cantaloupe, pear, yogurt, and mint leaves in a blender. Blend until smooth.
